item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 1, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Building LLMs from the Ground Up: A 3-Hour Coding Workshop (390 points | 16 comments)
2. Playstation 2 GS emulation – the final frontier of Vulkan compute emulation (22 points | 3 comments)
3. Taming the beast that is the Django ORM – An introduction (35 points | 8 comments)
4. Harder Drive: hard drives we didn't want, or need [video] (2022) (303 points | 55 comments)
5. Did your car witness a crime? (194 points | 416 comments)
6. WatchYourLAN: Lightweight Network IP Scanner (110 points | 8 comments)
7. Making an atomic trampoline [video] (54 points | 14 comments)
8. MapRoulette: the micro-tasking tool for OpenStreetMap (21 points | 7 comments)
9. A brief history of barbed wire fence telephone networks (47 points | 7 comments)
10. Percona Everest: open-source automated database provisioning and management (47 points | 13 comments)
11. Astronomers puzzled by little red galaxies that seem impossibly dense (43 points | 23 comments)
12. Neutral beam microscopy using magnetic beam spin encoding (23 points | discuss)
13. Brazil's X ban is sending lots of people to Bluesky (164 points | 267 comments)
14. Show HN: A retro terminal text editor for GNU/Linux coded in C (C-edit) (131 points | 35 comments)
15. Client-side QR code generator with SVG output (69 points | 12 comments)
16. Epilepsy Protection for VRChat (8 points | discuss)
17. Lucee: A light-weight dynamic CFML scripting language for the JVM (63 points | 23 comments)
18. Show HN: Typeform alternative, turns Markdown to forms (133 points | 43 comments)
19. Chatbots Are Primed to Warp Reality (4 points | discuss)
20. Continue (YC S23) Is Hiring a Software Engineer in San Francisco ( | hide)
21. There is only one amphibian emoji (42 points | 51 comments)
22. Non-Determinism and Overcount on Modern Hardware Performance Counters [pdf] (12 points | 1 comment)
23. Buy, Borrow, Die – Explained (374 points | 281 comments)
24. Solving the labyrinth puzzle from the university quest using Python (5 points | discuss)
25. Is my vision that bad? No, it's just a bug in Apple's Calculator (567 points | 359 comments)
26. LLMs struggle to explain themselves (42 points | 51 comments)
27. AirTags key to discovery of Houston's plastic recycling deception (112 points | 100 comments)
28. The Threat to OpenAI (115 points | 119 comments)
29. Designing a Timeline for Mobile Video Editing (63 points | 7 comments)
30. My fake job in Y2K preparedness (110 points | 77 comments)
